info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:46PM EDT until July 28 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN COLUMBIA AND SOUTHEASTERN RENSSELAER COUNTIES... At 546 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stephentown, or near Nassau, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nassau, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Valatie, Averill Park, West Sand Lake, Sand Lake, Canaan, East Nassau, Totem Lodge, Chatham Center, Garfield, North Stephentown, West Stephentown, Jacks Corners, Hoag Corners, Millers Corners, Rayville, Malden Bridge and Riders Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
